bit.name: try to stay still when crouched
crouch when in line of fire

float32.name: max vision distance
float32.description: maximum range of sight

degree.name: central vision angle
degree.description: horizontal angle within which we see targets out to our maximum range

degree.name: max vision angle
degree.description: maximum horizontal angle within which we see targets at range

degree.name: peripheral vision angle
degree.description: maximum horizontal angle within which we can see targets out of the corner of our eye

float32.name: peripheral distance
float32.description: maximum range at which we can see targets our of the corner of our eye

float32.name: standing gun offset
float32.description: offset of gun from feet when standing (x=forward, y=left, z=up) i

float32.name: standing gun offset
float32.description: offset of gun from feet when standing (x=forward, y=left, z=up) j

float32.name: standing gun offset
float32.description: offset of gun from feet when standing (x=forward, y=left, z=up) k

float32.name: crouching gun offset
float32.description: offset of gun from feet when crouch (x=forward, y=left, z=up) i

float32.name: crouching gun offset
float32.description: offset of gun from feet when crouch (x=forward, y=left, z=up) j

float32.name: crouching gun offset
float32.description: offset of gun from feet when crouch (x=forward, y=left, z=up) k

float32.name: hearing distance
float32.description: maximum range at which sounds can be heard

float32.name: notice projectile chance
float32.description: random chance of noticing a dangerous enemy projectile (e.g. grenade)

float32.name: notice vehicle chance
float32.description: random chance of noticing a dangerous vehicle

float32.name: combat perception time
float32.description: time required to acknowledge a visible enemy when we are already in combat or searching for them

float32.name: guard perception time
float32.description: time required to acknowledge a visible enemy when we have been alerted

float32.name: non-combat perception time
float32.description: time required to acknowledge a visible enemy when we are not alerted

float32.name: dive into cover chance
float32.description: chance of running a dive animation when moving into cover

float32.name: emerge from cover chance
float32.description: chance of running an emerge animation when uncovering a target

float32.name: dive from grenade chance
float32.description: chance of running a dive animation when moving away from a grenade

float32.name: pathfinding radius
float32.description: world units

float32.name: glass ignorance chance
float32.description: chance of not noticing that breakable surfaces have been destroyed

float32.name: stationary movement dist
float32.description: movement distance which is considered 'stationary' for considering whether we crouch

float32.name: free-flying sidestep
float32.description: distance which we allow sidestepping for flying units

degree.name: maximum aiming deviation
degree.description: how far we can turn our weapon y

degree.name: maximum aiming deviation
degree.description: how far we can turn our weapon p

degree.name: maximum looking deviation
degree.description: how far we can turn our head y

degree.name: maximum looking deviation
degree.description: how far we can turn our head p

degree.name: noncombat look delta L
degree.description: how far we can turn our head left away from our aiming vector when not in combat

degree.name: noncombat look delta R
degree.description: how far we can turn our head right away from our aiming vector when not in combat

degree.name: combat look delta L
degree.description: how far we can turn our head left away from our aiming vector when in combat

degree.name: combat look delta R
degree.description: how far we can turn our head right away from our aiming vector when in combat

degree.name: idle aiming range
degree.description: range in which we select random directions to aim in y

degree.name: idle aiming range
degree.description: range in which we select random directions to aim in p

degree.name: idle looking range
degree.description: range in which we select random directions to look at y

degree.name: idle looking range
degree.description: range in which we select random directions to look at p

float32.name: event look time modifier
float32.description: multiplier for how long we look at interesting events (zero = unchanged) min

float32.name: event look time modifier
float32.description: multiplier for how long we look at interesting events (zero = unchanged) max

float32.name: noncombat idle facing
float32.description: rate at which we change facing when looking around randomly when not in combat min

float32.name: noncombat idle facing
float32.description: rate at which we change facing when looking around randomly when not in combat max

float32.name: noncombat idle aiming
float32.description: rate at which we change aiming directions when looking around randomly when not in combat min

float32.name: noncombat idle aiming
float32.description: rate at which we change aiming directions when looking around randomly when not in combat max

float32.name: noncombat idle looking
float32.description: rate at which we change look around randomly when not in combat min

float32.name: noncombat idle looking
float32.description: rate at which we change look around randomly when not in combat max

float32.name: guard idle facing
float32.description: rate at which we change facing when looking around randomly when guarding min

float32.name: guard idle facing
float32.description: rate at which we change facing when looking around randomly when guarding max

float32.name: guard idle aiming
float32.description: rate at which we change aiming directions when looking around randomly when guarding min

float32.name: guard idle aiming
float32.description: rate at which we change aiming directions when looking around randomly when guarding max

float32.name: guard idle looking
float32.description: rate at which we change look around randomly when guarding min

float32.name: guard idle looking
float32.description: rate at which we change look around randomly when guarding max

float32.name: combat idle facing
float32.description: rate at which we change facing when looking around randomly when searching or in combat min

float32.name: combat idle facing
float32.description: rate at which we change facing when looking around randomly when searching or in combat max

float32.name: combat idle aiming
float32.description: rate at which we change aiming directions when looking around randomly when searching or in combat min

float32.name: combat idle aiming
float32.description: rate at which we change aiming directions when looking around randomly when searching or in combat max

float32.name: combat idle looking
float32.description: rate at which we change look around randomly when searching or in combat min

float32.name: combat idle looking
float32.description: rate at which we change look around randomly when searching or in combat max

enum16.name: unreachable danger trigger#danger level of an unreachable enemy which will trigger a retreat if it continues over time
vehicle danger trigger#danger level of a vehicle-based enemy which will trigger a retreat if it continues over time
player danger trigger#danger level of an enemy player which will trigger a retreat if it continues over time

float32.name: danger trigger time
float32.description: how long it takes for an unopposable enemy that has the above danger level to trigger a retreat min

float32.name: danger trigger time
float32.description: how long it takes for an unopposable enemy that has the above danger level to trigger a retreat max

int16.name: friends killed trigger
int16.description: if this many of our friends are killed by an unopposable enemy, we trigger a retreat (zero = never use this as a retreat condition)

int16.name: friends retreating trigger
int16.description: if this many of our friends are retreating from an unopposable enemy, we retreat as well (zero = never use this as a retreat condition)

float32.name: retreat time
float32.description: how long we retreat from an unopposable enemy for min

float32.name: retreat time
float32.description: how long we retreat from an unopposable enemy for max

float32.name: cowering time
float32.description: how long we hide in cover after being panicked min

float32.name: cowering time
float32.description: how long we hide in cover after being panicked max

float32.name: friend killed panic chance
float32.description: chance of panicking when we see a friend killed near us and the enemy is looking at us too

enum16.name: leader type#if we see a friend of this type killed we have a chance of panicking

float32.name: leader killed panic chance
float32.description: chance of panicking when we see a leader killed

float32.name: panic damage threshold
float32.description: panic if we take this much body damage in a short period of time

float32.name: surprise distance
float32.description: the distance at which newly acknowledged props or weapon impacts are considered 'close' for surprise purposes

plugin.comment: danger values: being aimed at: 0.7 an enemy shooting in our general direction: 1.2 an enemy shooting directly at us: 1.6 an enemy damaging us: 2.0

float32.name: hide behind cover time
float32.description: how long we stay behind cover after seeking cover min

float32.name: hide behind cover time
float32.description: how long we stay behind cover after seeking cover max

float32.name: hide target-not-visible time
float32.description: if this is non-zero then we will only seek cover if our target has not been visible recently

float32.name: hide shield fraction
float32.description: elites and jackals only seek cover if their shield falls below this value

float32.name: attack shield fraction
float32.description: elites and jackals only come out from cover to attack if they have this much shields

float32.name: pursue shield fraction
float32.description: elites and jackals only come out from cover to pursue if they have this much shields

float32.name: attacking crouch threshold
float32.description: when in attacking mode, if our crouch type is based on shields, we crouch when our shields are below this number; if our crouch type is based on danger, we crouch when our danger is above this number

float32.name: defending crouch threshold
float32.description: when in defending mode, if our crouch type is based on shields, we crouch when our shields are below this number; if our crouch type is based on danger, we crouch when our danger is above this number

float32.name: min stand time
float32.description: minimum time to remain standing (zero = default)

float32.name: min crouch time
float32.description: minimum time to remain crouching (zero = default)

float32.name: defending hide time modifier
float32.description: how much longer we hide behind cover for when in the defending state (zero = unchanged)

float32.name: attacking evasion threshold
float32.description: when in attacking mode, we consider seeking cover or evading when our danger gets this high

float32.name: defending evasion threshold
float32.description: when in defending mode, we consider seeking cover or evading when our danger gets this high

float32.name: evasion seek-cover chance
float32.description: chance of seeking cover (otherwise we just evade)

float32.name: evasion delay time
float32.description: minimum time period between evasion moves

float32.name: max seek-cover distance
float32.description: maximum distance we will consider going to find cover (zero = default)

float32.name: cover damage threshold
float32.description: how much damage we must take before we are allowed to seek cover (zero = always allowed to)

float32.name: stalking discovery time
float32.description: if our target sees us for this long while we are stalking them, our cover is blown and we do something else (zero = never stop stalking)

float32.name: stalking max distance
float32.description: distance outside of which we don't bother stalking

degree.name: stationary facing angle
degree.description: angle outside of which we must abandon a stationary facing direction and suffer any penalties

float32.name: change-facing stand time
float32.description: how long we must stand up for after changing our fixed stationary facing

float32.name: uncover delay time
float32.description: time to look at target's position after it becomes visible min

float32.name: uncover delay time
float32.description: time to look at target's position after it becomes visible max

float32.name: target search time
float32.description: time we search at target's position min

float32.name: target search time
float32.description: time we search at target's position max

float32.name: pursuit-position time
float32.description: time we search at a pursuit position min

float32.name: pursuit-position time
float32.description: time we search at a pursuit position max

int16.name: num positions (coord)
int16.description: number of pursuit positions to check when in coordinated group search mode

int16.name: num positions (normal)
int16.description: number of pursuit positions to check when in normal search mode

float32.name: melee attack delay
float32.description: how long we must wait between attempting melee attacks

float32.name: melee fudge factor
float32.description: fudge factor that offsets how far in front of the target we start our attack (negative = we try to time our attack so that we go _through_ the target). this should be close to zero, but might be bigger for suiciding units

float32.name: melee charge time
float32.description: how long we can stay in the charging state trying to reach our target before we give up

float32.name: melee leap range
float32.description: we can launch leaping melee attacks at targets within these ranges (zero = can't leap) min

float32.name: melee leap range
float32.description: we can launch leaping melee attacks at targets within these ranges (zero = can't leap) max

float32.name: melee leap velocity
float32.description: how fast we spring at targets when launching a leaping melee attack

float32.name: melee leap chance
float32.description: chance of launching a leaping melee attack at a ground-based target (we always leap at flying targets)

float32.name: melee leap ballistic
float32.description: fraction that controls how ballistic our leaping melee trajectory is

float32.name: berserk damage amount
float32.description: amount of body damage in a short time that makes us berserk

float32.name: berserk damage threshold
float32.description: how low our body health must get before we will consider berserking

float32.name: berserk proximity
float32.description: if we ever get this close to a target, we berserk

float32.name: suicide sensing dist
float32.description: when we are this close to a target, we check to see if they're getting away and if so blow up

float32.name: berserk grenade chance
float32.description: chance of berserking when we have a dangerous projectile stuck to us

float32.name: guard position time
float32.description: time after which we decide to change guard positions (zero = never) min

float32.name: guard position time
float32.description: time after which we decide to change guard positions (zero = never) max

float32.name: combat position time
float32.description: time after which we change combat firing positions min

float32.name: combat position time
float32.description: time after which we change combat firing positions max

float32.name: old position avoid dist
float32.description: distance we try and stay from our last discarded firing position

float32.name: friend avoid dist
float32.description: distance we try and stay from any friends

float32.name: noncombat idle speech time
float32.description: time between idle vocalizations when we are not in combat min

float32.name: noncombat idle speech time
float32.description: time between idle vocalizations when we are not in combat max

float32.name: combat idle speech time
float32.description: time between idle vocalizations when we are in combat or searching min

float32.name: combat idle speech time
float32.description: time between idle vocalizations when we are in combat or searching max
